comment:
* Utility class comprising of static methods to check correct constructor or method invocation.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static T checkNotNull(T reference, String errorMessage)
methods.comment:
* Ensures that an object reference passed as a parameter to the calling method is not null.
     *
     * @param reference    an object reference
     * @param errorMessage the exception message to use if the check fails
     * @return the non-null reference that was validated
     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code reference} is null

methods.name: public static void checkArgument(boolean expression, String errorMessage)
methods.comment:
* Ensures the truth of an expression involving one or more parameters to the calling method.
     *
     * @param expression   a boolean expression
     * @param errorMessage the exception message to use if the check fails
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code expression} is false

methodNames: public static T checkNotNull(T reference, String errorMessage)
public static void checkArgument(boolean expression, String errorMessage)
